definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Application-layer traffic identification and control is the precondition of network billing and management.
sentences.chinese: 應用層流量識別及控制是網絡計費和網絡管理的前提。

sentences.english: You should refactor the code to separate the various application layers.
sentences.chinese: 應當重構代碼以分離各個應用層。

sentences.english: This document describes a protocol for the application-layer traversal of IP network firewalls.
sentences.chinese: 本文檔描述了一個應用層上的ip網絡防火牆協議。

sentences.english: Traditionally, these rules have always been implemented on the application layer.
sentences.chinese: 一般情況下，這些規則總是在應用層實現。

sentences.english: SIP is a text-based application-layer protocol.
sentences.chinese: IP是一個基於文本的應用層控制協議。

sentences.english: A binding is a logical link between two devices at the application layer.
sentences.chinese: 綁定是應用層上兩個設備的邏輯鏈接。

sentences.english: However, additional transformation is frequently needed both at the protocol and application levels.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在協議層和應用層常常需要其它形式的轉換。

sentences.english: In this case, a significant amount is spent in application layer.
sentences.chinese: 在本例中，大量時間花費在了應用層上。

sentences.english: This is the application layer component in the IBSS system.
sentences.chinese: 這是系統的應用層部分。

sentences.english: Application layer multicast protocol sends packets to group members by the spanning tree.
sentences.chinese: 應用層多播通過生成樹將多播分組送至每一個組成員。

sentences.english: Play an important role in application-layer analyzing, namely the requirement analyzing.
sentences.chinese: 參與對應用層，即需求問題的分析。

sentences.english: This allows to scale out application tier independent of the session replication tier.
sentences.chinese: 這還可以獨立於會話複製層擴展應用層。

sentences.english: We will focus on the application and database tiers.
sentences.chinese: 我們將主要關注於應用層和數據庫層。

sentences.english: Application-layer multicast is an important research topic for the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 應用層多播是互聯網研究的一個重要課題。

sentences.english: Application-layer framework for the definition of guardianship agreement network nodes.
sentences.chinese: 應用層框架定義監護網絡節點協議。

sentences.english: The application layer and the transport layer use end-to-end protocols.
sentences.chinese: 應用層和傳輸層使用端到端協議。
